title: Why Some Companies Are Ahead in the Race to Net Zero - BCG
summary: The article discusses the challenges, signs of progress, competitive advantages, and a path forward for companies in reducing emissions and benefiting from decarbonization.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses efforts by companies to reduce emissions in line with environmental sustainability goals, which aligns with the definition of green innovation.
business_innovation: FALSE. The article does not primarily focus on introducing new or significantly improved business products or processes, so it does not meet the definition of business innovation.
green_product: TRUE. The article highlights companies striving to reduce environmental impact throughout their product lifecycle, demonstrating characteristics of a green product.
green_process: TRUE. The article emphasizes methods and techniques adopted by companies to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability in their operational activities, fitting the definition of a green process.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 562910 - Remediation Services, 541620 - Environmental Consulting Services, 562112 - Hazardous Waste Collection, 541330 - Engineering Services
greenwashing: FALSE. The article focuses on genuine efforts by companies to reduce emissions and improve sustainability practices, rather than deceptive or misleading environmental claims.

title: Arcade Beauty Acquires TruEssence® from ORLANDI - PR Newswire
summary: Arcade Beauty acquires ORLANDI's TruEssence® business, marks ORLANDI's exit from scented strips category, consolidates operations in Chattanooga, TN.
green_innovation: FALSE; The article does not explicitly mention any environmental sustainability goals or contributions to reducing negative environmental externalities.
business_innovation: TRUE; The acquisition and consolidation of operations by Arcade Beauty represents a new business process to enhance efficiency and competitiveness.
green_product: FALSE; The article does not detail how the product or service significantly reduces its environmental impact throughout its life cycle.
green_process: FALSE; The article does not provide specific information on how manufacturing or production processes are being improved to minimize environmental impacts.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 325620 Toilet Preparation Manufacturing, 325998 All Other Miscellaneous Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing, 325410 Pharmaceutical and Medicine Manufacturing, 561910 Packaging and Labeling Services
greenwashing: FALSE; The article mainly focuses on the business acquisition and operational changes, without making any false or misleading environmental benefit claims.
